data.text:
@GaviSeth @NphcdaNG Great job Mr. Seth.
Vaccination comes with certain degrees of resistance and covid-19 vaccines are not exempted. But I strongly believe with right amount of accurate IEC materials e.g video & audio jingles, radio and TV broadcast, posters, etc. more coverage would be achieved.
@GaviSeth @MBuhari @NGRPresident Easy cold chain and pre-filled syringe vaccine will help

We finished the trip with a meeting with the President @MBuhari @NGRPresident where we discussed the progress that had been made since our last visit two years ago and where we saw the challenges including asking His Excellency for his commitment to help solve them.

As health is a state level activity, we were pleased to meet with 11 Governors hosted by the Chair of the Nigerian Governors Forum @kfayemi @NGFSecretariat to discuss state plans, funding and the disparities in performance between different states. https://t.co/Khcj45QNxU
We also met with the Finance & Budget minister @ZShamsuna who is a co-signatory of the accountability framework to discuss financing Immunisation and primary health care https://t.co/H7ZVhjKDJR

We were hosted by the Minister of Health @DrEOEhanire and the ED of the NPHCDA @drfaisalshuaib here at the Interagency Coordinating Committee looking in detail at the progress made of the last two years as well as the many challenges. https://t.co/vo9a9cROYZ
